alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 4:57PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gem, south central Adams and southeastern Washington Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 457 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mann Creek Reservoir, or 8 miles northeast of Weiser, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Presley Bridge, Midvale Hill and Midvale around 500 PM MDT. Crane Creek Reservoir, Star Butte, Paddock Valley Reservoir and Bear Creek Summit around 510 PM MDT. Granger Butte around 520 PM MDT. Dodson Pass and Four Bit Summit around 530 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Weiser River; West Central Mountains
